Recent Updates.text: 'Transportation Scenario Planning with Graph Neural Networks' accepted to UrbComp 2021 and 'COVID-19 EnsembleVis: Visual Analysis of County-level Ensemble Forecast Models' accepted to VAHC 2021
Paper 'UrbanRama: Navigating Cities in Virtual Reality' accepted to TVCG!
CS 594 - Big Data Visualization and Analytics (Fall 2021) website.
I will be joining the Dept. of Computer Science at the University of Illinois at Chicago in October 2020 as an Assistant Professor!
New shadow data for Chicago, Los Angeles, Washington D.C. and Boston.
Paper 'Urban Mosaic: Visual Exploration of Streetscapes Using Large-Scale Image Data ' accepted to CHI 2020!
Paper 'Learning Geo-Contextual Embeddings for Commuting Flow Prediction' accepted to AAAI 2020!
SIGMOD 2018 Best Demo Award for the paper 'Interactive Visual Exploration of Spatio-Temporal Urban Data Sets using Urbane'
Pearl Brownstein Doctoral Research Award: Doctoral research that shows the greatest promise, given by NYU in 2018.
Urban Pulse featured on Architectural Digest.
Urban Pulse code is now available on github, with a new web interface.
Shadow project featured on The New York Times (and later featured on several websites).
Urban Pulse featured on The Economist.
